title: Seventy Cities in Twenty Years Starting in Royal Oak, Michigan
post: Really!! Where was the news on this?  Good grief, seems like quite a nice exhibit that no one knew existed.  C’mon people…Field of Dreams is nonsense.  Build it and they will NOT come unless they know about it!
